title: Loot Crate (bug maybe??)
body: Is there a way to see loot history? because I believe I got ironscale shyvanna when i did a 3 skin reroll & I don't even own shyvanna, but the weird part is that its not showing up in loot either, like it vanished. I've looked for this skin if its not the shyvanna skin through all of my champions & I don't have any new ones that I've found.

replies.body: Unlocked content should appear in your store's purchase history.  I checked into this for you, and I do see that you unlocked a Permanent for Ironscale Shyvana.  It turns out that you used this and 2 other skin shards, and rerolled them into Arctic Ops Kennen.  Let me know if that helps with clearing some things up.

Oh shoot I used it to reroll again? must have been my bad in miscounting, either way I appreciate the help and you clearing this up for me. I was just confused about where it might have gone since I didnt have her yet because I was interested in using it, but the kennen skin suffices. Thank you!
